on reading compounds: 馳駆【チク】dashing around on a horse, running around, exerting oneself (for another)
馳走【チソウ】treat, banquet, feast, entertainment, goodies, running about
kun reading compounds: 馳せる【はせる】to run, to hurry (when going somewhere), to drive (a car) quickly, to ride fast (on a horse), to win (fame)
